name: Amazing Cats- Pet Bath, Dress Up Games for girls
name_original: Amazing Cats- Pet Bath, Dress Up Games for girls
description:
Which cats do you like better? There are 13 cute cats. Pick your favorite cats and dress them up! You can dress up your cats in hundreds of combination of costumes and share your cats with friends and family!


>13 most popular cats
>60 awesome costumes
>72 amazing toys with magic animations
>33 funny hats
>32 cute shoes, boots and sandals
>25 fashion sunglasses
>16 magic suit show animations
>13 attractive topic background
>Take a picture for you and cats together to share with friends and family
>Record the voice with your cats
